item.title: List of SendQuests
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Just Wondered if anyone wanted these, But here they are. They are most of teh Send quest ID’s for the Sidebar interfaces, exception of Music and Quests.

[code]//----Bank----
sendQuest("@whi@Bank Of SantaScape", 5383);

To add them without lag…
[b]Step 1;[/]
Make a void like this:

public void sendQuests() { PASTE THE LIST HERE! }
Step 2;
Add sendQuests();
Under case 121:
